comments: a(n) = Min{x : A052180[x] = p(n) = A000040(n)}. E.g. n = 4: a(4) = 15 since p(4) = 7 occurs first in A052180 as the term with subscript 15, A052180(15) = A052180(A083270[4]) = A000040(4) = 7. - _Labos Elemer_, May 14 2003Number of primes determined at the n-th step of the Eratosthenes' sieve. - _Jean-Christophe HervÃ©_, Oct 21 2013
